Package ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic.component.card

Contains the implementation of all the cards used for the game.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Active
    Represents cards having some actions.
    Interactive
    Represents interface of 'active' cards which need further information from the actor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    Abstract class Card for all types of cards
    CardFactory
    CardFactory class to create Cards
    EventCard
    Abstract class for EventCards EventCards are cards that get played when a black card is put on the discard pile
    HandCard
    Abstract class of Handcards All Handcards can be in a players hand Handcards have a unique id
    NumeralCard
    Abstract class for all Cards with a number All Numberal Cards are Handcards the number of the card is also the value of the card
    SpecialCard
    Abstract class for all Handcards without a number
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Interactive.CardQuestion
    Cardquestion for special cards
